title: UIMA: feature value map to dynamicField
description:
I think "a value of feature maps to a dynamicField" is a nice to have function.

http://www.lucidimagination.com/search/document/983a059d6d370ce/uima_fieldmappings_and_solr_dynamicfield

comments.author: Koji Sekiguchi
comments.content:
New patch attached. I changed DummyEntityAnnotator to express my idea and added test.

If no one objects, I'll commit in a few days.

comments.author: Koji Sekiguchi
comments.content: Added a minor comment to the test Annotator.
